name: Rest In Space
description:
The game puts you on a movable turret.

Use it to defeat all threats.

HOW TO PLAY:
  • Use your Keyboard&Mouse.
  • The game is wave based.
  • You need two shots to kill your enemies.
  • The shield restores itself in each wave.
  • The health doesn't restore itself.
